pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. image:: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/YanhuiJessica/cheb3/main/docs/_static/img/cheb3.png :width: 300 :align: centerInstallation============.. code-block:: shell $ python3 -m pip install cheb3.. end-of-readme-introExamples========Examples of using `cheb3` in CTF challenges can be found in `/examples <examples/>`_.Documentation=============- Quick Start - `Making Connections <https://cheb3.readthedocs.io/en/latest/connection_basis.html>`_ - `Interaction Basis <https://cheb3.readthedocs.io/en/latest/interaction_basis.html>`_- API Reference - `Connection <https://cheb3.readthedocs.io/en/latest/connection.html>`_ - `Account <https://cheb3.readthedocs.io/en/latest/account.html>`_ - `Contract <https://cheb3.readthedocs.io/en/latest/contract.html>`_ - `cheb3.utils <https://cheb3.readthedocs.io/en/latest/utils.html>`_
